posts.post_content:
Emails have priority.
[url]trae@t206.org[/url]

Important Note: As of 3pm Eastern on Wednesday 8/31 I am going to be offline until September 10th, so please don't expect a reply until then.

More stuff [URL="http://www.collectorfocus.com/collection/traeregan/for-sale"]here[/URL] too. Offers welcome.

Larger scan available, just drop me a line.

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/traeregan/for-sale/3051/seitz-charles[/IMG]

Thanks for looking :)
Although the borders are bit off, this card looks pretty sharp for only an "A" grade.
